Subject: Forces
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Unicron/Shockwave/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/
Dark Claw/Groove/Streetwise:




Unicron saw a few bots approaching and flew hard right before they could get 
around him and he simply laughed, continuing on his way towards "Red Hero", 
raising his arms and launching one energy-signature seeking missile at Angel 
Prime, another of the same type from the other arm at Starwind.

---

Vehement dived down, only half the blast striking him, this time cutting into 
his arm but his more armored torso was still unbreached.  Vehement fired down 
two rapid optic blasts at Tavatron's left knee joint, continuing on his 
course to follow Unicron.

---

Sun Crusher transformed to biped mode and flew away from the Cybertronian 
Fire, shaking violently for a moment as the energy blast meant for him missed 
and exploded and he was struck with the shock wave.

He fired off ten rapid optic blasts at Angel Prime, continuing on with his 
flight.

---

Reflector flew down hard left, much faster than his comrades, and wasn't 
struck with any enemy fire.  He raised an arm, launching two missiles off at 
the Cybertronian Fire, keeping on course in pursuit of Unicron.

---

Demon Wulf felt blasts strike his armor, and he turned towards Streetwise and 
Groove, raising his sword and the blade launching out as a missile.  With a 
flash the blade was replaced.

---

Flesh Ripper ducked, one shot striking his chest and almost knocking his 
unbalanced form over.  He growled, firing off three optic blasts at 
Streetwise's abdomen.

---

Dark Claw got a target lock, and launched two missiles from both ports, four 
in all at the Cybertronian Fire.  His brothers could handle the pathetic 
Maximals engaging them.

---

Groove jumped, the missile going off and adding unwanted power to his jump, 
the Maximal slamming to the ground belly first with a thud.  He shook his 
head, firing off two photon bolts at Demon Wulf's right arm in return.

---

Streetwise jumped a few seconds too late, and was thrown harder than Groove 
and landed on his elbow with a sickening crunch.  He couldn't move his left 
arm from the elbow down.  At least he hadn't been hit with the laser blasts.  
Lucky him.

He got up quickly and charged, firing three blasts from his photon pistol at 
Flesh Ripper's left knee joint.

---

Shockwave got a target lock, and launched off two missiles at the 
Cybertronian Fire, raining down fifteen rapid laser blasts down at Streetwise.
